function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of DDT in vector control","Impact":"Residuality and environmental impact of DDT","Mitigation":"Adopting alternative, non-toxic insecticides and regular monitoring of environmental impact","Technologies":"Non-toxic insecticides, monitoring and surveillance technologies","People":"Population in sprayed and unsprayed areas, environmental ecosystem","Owner":"Government, environmental protection agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Abandonment of global malaria eradication programs","Impact":"Proliferation of malaria and potential epidemics","Mitigation":"Reinstating global eradication programs, implementing effective control measures, and promoting international collaboration","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance, data analysis, international cooperation platforms","People":"Global population, particularly in malaria-endemic regions","Owner":"World Health Organization, national health authorities, international health organizations"}]}
